{{Description|"A gambling addiction is going to do you no good. I mean, let me just do the math for you as the dealer. What do you think your odds of beating me are, when I have seven dice and you, only one?"}}
'''Depth-Clarion Dice''' is [[Yelan]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* {{TalentNote|icd|Coordinated Attack DMG|2|3}}
* {{TalentNote|character=Yelan|talent=Depth-Clarion Dice|no snapshot|Exquisite Throw DMG}}
* If [[Lingering Lifeline]] is used the maximum amount of times during Exquisite Throw, Exquisite Throw can fire up to '''17''' times at Constellation Level 0, and '''18''' times at Constellation Level 1, for a total DMG of (including the initial hit):
** At Talent Level 1 &mdash; 255.68% Max HP
** At Talent Level 10 &mdash; 460.42% Max HP
** At Talent Level 1 and Constellation Level 1 &mdash; 271.9% Max HP
** At Talent Level 10 and Constellation Level 1 &mdash; 486.73% Max HP
** At Talent Level 1 and Constellation Level 2 &mdash; 383.9%
** At Talent Level 10 and Constellation Level 2 &mdash; 598.73% Max HP
** At Talent Level 13 &mdash; 686.43% Max HP
* If Lingering Lifeline is not used during Exquisite Throw, Exquisite Throw can fire up to '''15''' times, for a total DMG of (including the initial hit):
** At Talent Level 1 &mdash; 226.46% Max HP
** At Talent Level 10 &mdash; 409.27% Max HP
** At Talent Level 1 and Constellation Level 2 &mdash; 338.46% Max HP
** At Talent Level 10 and Constellation Level 2 &mdash; 521.27% Max HP
** At Talent Level 13 &mdash; 593.28% Max HP
* {{TalentNote|character=Yelan|talent=Depth-Clarion Dice|ascension|2|Adapt With Ease}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
